dt: {bc}the ability to withstand hardship or adversity
{bc}the ability to sustain a prolonged stressful effort or activity
{bc}the act or an instance of {d_link|enduring|endure} or suffering

shortdef: the ability to withstand hardship or adversity; especially : the ability to sustain a prolonged stressful effort or activity
the act or an instance of enduring or suffering

dt: {bc}past the limit of one's ability to deal with pain and suffering that is intense or continues for a long time

shortdef: past the limit of one's ability to deal with pain and suffering that is intense or continues for a long time
